transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan boliye madam
Executive: Hi good afternoon sir, Jai Shree appreciation se baat ho rahi hai meri
Customer: Haan boliye madam
Executive: Ji sir ek to baat karni hai IndiaMART pe aake jo aap
Customer: Sir na ek sir video meeting pe connect karna tha aapke concern ke regarding to location vagaira ka aapka kar sakte hai na by list ke regarding
Executive: Haan haan mujhe nahi mil rahe the isliye wait
Customer: Haan link bhej do main connect karta madam
Executive: Kitni der mein karenge sir batao link mein
Customer: Ek do minute mein madam
Executive: Theek hai sir alright link ko share kar diya hai aapki jo mail id hai na waha pe share kar diya hai theek hai okay okay whatsapp pe bhi kar do bataiye
Customer: Nahi nahi wo link connect karta main abhi gadi gadi side leke karta bahar mein
Executive: Theek hai aap kar lijiye aaram se mere ko ek baar call back kar lijiyega theek hai
Customer: Okay okay do minute mein connect karta
Executive: Haan sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to connect on video meeting.

- Customer was unable to find the link.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the link on customer's email.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect in 2 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, link, location
